item.description:
This is a hands-on workshop where we will be doing money magick:

There will be a short lecture with paperwork, on the basics of magick, specifically focusing on money correspondences and money magick.

Everyone will procede to make their own money incense, money oil, and a money sachet. We will then do money candle magick, with charging and sending energy to make our spell complete.

The class will be from 7:00- 10:00 pm in Fiskedale, Mass

The total cost will be $35.00-
$15.00 for the class + $20.00 for all materials including paperwork.

Please plan on bringing cash or a check- paypal is also available if you email me personally at: talawolf7@charter.net
Please wear comfortable clothing and it will be helpful if participants have a mortar and pestle, however this is not necessary to take class.

These can be bought for $10 at Marshalls in the home goods dept- Please note it is best to get a marble one, or a stone one :)
item.how_to_find_us: Park next door at the Copper Stallion and come in Cornerstones front door :)
item.name: Money Oils, Incense & Magick (Sturbridge)
